Articles.Content:
It isn't a massive problem, but I went to sleep with my timewarp on and I didn't notice until I had overwritten my main save + quicksave.

Does anyone know where in my save file I can edit the universal time?

Here's a link to a picture of the problem, the resolution is a bit too big to embed it.

[http://i.imgur.com/JMfwSBU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JMfwSBU.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T03:06:06Z" title="05/16/2015 03:06  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by VetraKR**
Backup you save first! I think what you want is under FLIGHTSTATE, UT = XXXX.XXXX.

That did it! Wonderful!

Thank you very much! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
